title: PLEASE RIOT HELP ME
body: OMG RIOT PLEASE HELP ME. I play LoL about 2 years and i have 1 problem about 6 months: always if in game jinx champion i got dc, PLEASE HELP ME FIX IT, I ALWAYS LOSE GAME BCS OF THAT

replies.body: Can you give me some more details as to what occurs just before you DC? Do you notice any changes in your FPS or latency (ping) when this happens?
before that i dont see what enemy champions do, i dont see what my champ do, minions never die, they always fight.No changes in my FPS and ping

It certainly sounds like this may be an out-of-sync symptom caused by an unstable connection to the gameservers you're connecting to. I'd recommend going through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to address the most likely network configurations that could cause this to happen.

If you still encounter these issues after taking those steps, please let me know.
All of the steps listed in the guide would by my suggestion. This way we can 100% ensure your local network settings are configured properly for League. ^.^
